body:
I am, came back to see if you would reply. Given the comment activity you're getting at the moment I was sure you would notice it.

Although, the error I found was nothing. Noticed that it was just  the decensored release combined with the censored release. Note now that you have two of the same (decensored) now:
http://nhentai.net/g/113810/
http://nhentai.net/g/113775/

@qt1066: Notifications aren't implemented yet, so I'm not sure if you're still following this. Just send us an email (you can find the address at the bottom of the Info page) and we'll take care of it.
If we find the same thing, or errors like in this one, how do we notify staff?
